cart.name: Classic Crew Neck T-Shirt
cart.shortDescription: A timeless essential, crafted from premium soft cotton for ultimate comfort.
cart.longDescription: Our Classic Crew Neck T-Shirt is a wardrobe staple. Made from 100% premium combed cotton, it offers a soft, breathable feel that lasts. Its classic fit is versatile enough to be worn on its own or as a layering piece. Available in a range of essential colors.
cart.sizingAndFit: Classic fit. True to size. Model is 6'1" and wearing a size M.
cart.materialsAndCare: 100% Combed Cotton. Machine wash cold, tumble dry low. Do not bleach.

cart.name: Flannel Checkered Shirt
cart.shortDescription: A rugged yet incredibly soft flannel for ultimate comfort and warmth.
cart.longDescription: Our Flannel Checkered Shirt is crafted from ultra-soft, double-brushed cotton flannel. It's the perfect companion for chilly days, offering both warmth and timeless style. Features two chest pockets with button flaps and a classic plaid pattern.
cart.sizingAndFit: Classic fit. Generously cut for layering. Model is 6'2" and wearing a size L.
cart.materialsAndCare: 100% Cotton Flannel. Machine wash cold. Tumble dry low.

cart.name: Short-Sleeve Denim Shirt
cart.shortDescription: A versatile and stylish short-sleeve shirt in lightweight denim.
cart.longDescription: A modern take on a classic workwear staple. Our Short-Sleeve Denim Shirt is made from lightweight denim that's comfortable enough for all-day wear. It features a snap-button front and a western-style yoke for a touch of authentic charm.
cart.sizingAndFit: Slim fit. Tapered at the chest and waist. Model is 5'11" and wearing a size M.
cart.materialsAndCare: 100% Cotton Denim. Machine wash cold. Tumble dry medium.
